title: Game hub utilizing RAWG API and React
description: A game hub that allows users to search for games, view game details, and save games to their favorites list. Utilizes the RAWG API to fetch game data.

title: Language Learning App
description: A modern language learning application that helps users practice pronunciation and vocabulary through speech recognition and text-to-speech capabilities.

title: Wardrobe Fitter App API
description: Wardrobe Fitter is a modern wardrobe management application that helps users organize, track, and style their clothing items

title: HR Management System
description: A comprehensive HR management system that streamlines employee management, payroll processing, and performance tracking.

title: Dictionary API
description: A RESTful API that provides definitions, synonyms, and translations for words in  english.

title: Ecommerce API
description: Ecommerce api build with django with emphasis on testing

title: Syncwave studios
description: Syncwave studios is a modern music production studio that helps users create, edit, and share their music.
